misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
Finally made his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after 20 years of trying.
biography: Harri, affectionately known in golfing circles as "the doctor", is a seasoned competitor hailing from Hattula Golf. A familiar face at the Hector Trophée, Harri will be making his sixth appearance in 2025.

Despite his advanced age, Harri is renowned for his bomb drives and strategic play, making him a formidable opponent in any format. After two decades of relentless pursuit, Harri finally achieved his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, a testament to his unwavering dedication and perseverance.

With two past Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Harri's experience and competitive spirit make him one to watch. Although the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his focus remains steadfast on securing another Hector Trophée victory alongside his partner.
